Comment: As an Illinois resident. The Pritzker family are what billionaires should be.   ARE THEY SILLY RICH? Yes. They also do tons of philanthropy and things for the arts and sciences.   I recall some years ago when the planetarium in Chicago wanted a moon rock from NASA (this was a huge deal then) but couldn't afford it. They called the Pritzker family and the response was apparently as simple as "just tell us how much you need".  Their foundation gives out millions. And its not like just JB is the billionaire. It's a family affair.   I want him to stay governor.... but he would also make a damn good president. He's fixed so much in Illinois so quickly.
